tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserBehaviorPatterns (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(255),
  behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
  behavior_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ContentRecommendations (
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recommendation_title VARCHAR(255),
  recommended_by VARCHAR(100),
  recommendation_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  preference_category VARCHAR(50),
  preference_type VARCHAR(50),
  preference_score FLOAT
)
CREATE TABLE user_profiles ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), signup_date DATE )

CREATE TABLE user_interactions ( interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(50), interaction_date TIMESTAMP, interaction_details VARCHAR(255), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id) )
CREATE TABLE content_items ( content_id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), category VARCHAR(50), tags VARCHAR(255), publish_date DATE )

CREATE TABLE recommendations ( recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, content_id INT, recommendation_date TIMESTAMP, recommendation_score DECIMAL(5,2), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES content_items(content_id) )

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE content (
    content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    preference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    content_id UUID REFERENCES content(content_id),
    rating INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    content_id UUID REFERENCES content(content_id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
